DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TECHNOLOGY
DOC.TEXT: Apple Unveils New PowerBooks : Apple Computer introduced new PowerBook notebook_computers featuring an innovative way to move the cursor.Instead of a trackball or mouse , the four new PowerBook 500 models feature a touch-sensitive rectangular area below the space_bar . The cursor is moved by running a finger over the space . The new machines and two sub-notebook versions are immediately available and replace most existing PowerBooks . Apple also cut_prices of its older PowerBooks and several other computers by up_to 27 % .
